boot.name: Boot Zone
boot.subtitle: System Initialization
boot.description: The starting point of your journey. Initialize systems and access the world map.

device.name: Device Zone
device.subtitle: Hardware Detection
device.description: Detect and analyze connected devices. View hardware information and capabilities.

signal.name: Signal Zone
signal.subtitle: Communication Analysis
signal.description: Analyze device communications and compliance status. Requires Silver Star.

memory.name: Memory Zone
memory.subtitle: Data Classification
memory.description: Classify and manage device data. Legal status and jurisdiction analysis.

power.name: Power Zone
power.subtitle: Energy & Certification
power.description: Manage certifications and authorization levels. Power Star verification.

forge.name: Forge Zone
forge.subtitle: Creation & Repair
forge.description: Advanced repair operations and custodian vault access. Requires Gold Star.

shadow.name: Shadow Zone
shadow.subtitle: Operations Center
shadow.description: Command and control operations. Real-time monitoring and metrics.

chaos.name: Chaos Zone
chaos.subtitle: Advanced Systems
chaos.description: Advanced system operations for experienced operators only.

core.name: Core Zone
core.subtitle: Phoenix Key Access
core.description: Core system access. Requires Black Star (Phoenix Key holder only).

bronze.name: Bronze Star
bronze.description: View and observe system state. Read-only access.

silver.name: Silver Star
silver.description: Route devices and prepare operations. Analysis access.

gold.name: Gold Star
gold.description: Execute operations via downstream systems. Full operational access.

black.name: Black Star
black.description: Core system access. Phoenix Key holder. Local authority.

devices.connect_prompt: Connect a device via USB and enable USB debugging

auth.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.not_found: The requested resource was not found.
errors.rate_limited: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
errors.server_error: Server error. Please contact support if this persists.

legal.disclaimer: This platform provides analysis and documentation only.
legal.no_modification: No modification, circumvention, or account interference is performed or advised.
legal.compliance_notice: All operations are logged for compliance purposes.
